quoteText: In addition to the categories noted above, we may also collect location information if you have instructed your Device to send such information via the privacy settings on that Device, or, for example, if you have uploaded photos tagged with location information. We may use your location information directly and/or share your location with third-parties.
title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data
